messages.title: Standing up for Real change
messages.content: Despite huge opposition to new housing developments our MP's ignore us, the Conservatives have now gone further by bringing in a candidate who specialises in Planning Law. Living and working in London she can put it all behind her when she goes home, leaving us with a gridlocked urban sprawl. Being local I want to defend Fareham, I was born in Eastleigh and have lived and worked locally all my life. I believe that Fareham needs a local, motivated person with a passion for the area. Let's work together for Fareham.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.
UKIP will pour £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS to keep it as a free public service, funded by scrapping our £55 million a day EU membership fee.
UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP the tax on your children when you die.
By stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the £30 million a day spent on foreign aid, UKIP is the ONLY PARTY with money to spend at home.

issues.health: UKIP will pour £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS.
